name: Dice Souls (vlaflya)
description:
Arise now, ye DiceMan!

Action game that will test your GAMING SKILLS (and nerve system).

Losing is never the end. Start again and again until you reach the top of the tower.

Controlls: 

Left Mouce to roll -> Left Mouce to stop roll -> Left Mouce to Jump

R to restart

(itch lags and does't allow to change banner and screenshots :( )
